name: Kenyasalarymanage
tagline: With this package, you will be able to automatically calculate the NHIF, NSSF and PAYE rates of your salary or that of yor employees at any given time.
body:
###Salary Manage
SalaryManage provides developers with a tireless way to calculate the NSSF, NHIF and PAYE contributions of their employees. With this in place, one will be able to get the total contribution due for deduction.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
